name: The WORST Flight of 2022: Air India Regional
description:
Check out Henson Shaving and get 100 extra blades for FREE: use code noelphilips at http://bit.ly/3H1TlBq 
--
Well this flight ended up being my worst flight of 2022. I'd gone in expecting it to be the highlight of my trip to India - but, thanks to airport security and a filthy aircraft, it ended up being anything but.
